title: Smart Data Models - WindGenTurbineType3aIEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. IEC Type 3A generator set model.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.3.2.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindGenTurbineType3aIEC

kpc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Current PI controller proportional gain (K). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

tic.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Current PI controller integration time constant (T). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

xs.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Electromagnetic transient reactance (x). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0
